title: Cursed Canvas
description: An artist's masterpiece has come to life, and creatures from the painting are wreaking havoc. The player must enter the artwork to restore order.
subquest: Enter the enchanted painting and navigate its fantastical landscapes.
Seek out the artist's studio to find clues and guidance.
Solve puzzles to release trapped characters and restore harmony.
Defeat the formidable boss creature ruling over the cursed canvas.
Restore the artist's original vision by repairing the damaged artwork.
Escape the painting before the curse consumes the player forever.
